title: Social Studies Instructional Design and Learning Interaction Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic pedagogical theories and social studies curriculum content
context.additional_context: A program enhancing curriculum design and learning interaction development skills in social studies for pre-service and in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Social studies learning objectives can be classified by cognitive complexity levels through cognitive task analysis.
Social studies instructional strategies and interactive activities suitable for learner levels can be designed.
Formative and summative assessment tools applicable to online environments can be developed.
Learning content structures can be analyzed and utilized in the development of digital learning materials.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
